chapter.text: As you look through the various screens, you are met with a sudden jolt of sound and light as the power surges, then disappears completely. ^1500Shadows creep in as the screens fade to black. ^1500You turn around and see that the screams of joy have stopped. ^1500The kids are all gone. ^1500You walk through the now empty areas of the arcade. ^1500You hear a gentle tune play from a machine. ^1500You see the red screen glow out of the corner of your eye.
